title: 12/22/20 DPS - BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/22/20 DPS - BEST OF
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Pittsburgh's lost to the Bengals last night. Are the Steelers headed for a short postseason? We're joined by former NFL Head Coach Tony Dungy, former NFL Defensive Back/ Fox NFL Analyst Aqib Talib, and Fox Sports 1 host Nick Wright.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
